sources.title: A Christmas Hero | Free Full Movie | FilmRise
sources.description:
Firefighter Jenny has fallen in love with Tom. However his ex-wife Mary (a bestselling author) demands a reconciliation if he wants to see his daughter at Christmas. Starring Anna Hutchison, Marcus Rosner, and Anita Brown.

Subscribe to FilmRise Movies For More Free Full Movies: https://www.youtube.com/@UC8IHAQMuiJdY6ALuhG7iU8Q

metadata.Plot: When a young disillusioned war vet, home from Afghanistan, sees nothing good in his life during Christmas a visit by his guardian angel shows him that his life really did make a difference.
metadata.Actors: Michael Welch, Patrick Floch, Cat Grey
